channel.title: try on FAFA Blog
channel.description: Recent content in try on FAFA Blog

item.title: Try/catch
item.description: Try/catch try { int i = 10 / 0; } finally { System.out.println("last"); } 能够成功执行，并且会返回last，同时也会返回Exeception 提示：: / by zero finally 不一定都会被执行 try里面包含System.exit() finally 里包含异常就会抛出异常并终止执行 try { System.out.println("try"); } catch (Exception e) { System.out.println("catch"); } finally { int k = 3 / 0; System.out.println("finally"); } System.out.println("main");
